item.description:
Enjoy a cozy evening at Patti's place for an International Wine Tasting Party!

Beth DeGeer, a Wine Connoisseur, from Wallingford Center Street Wine & Spirits, will guide us through the Tasting. There will be 6 white and red flights from various regions of the world. Beth will also be available to answer questions on your favorite wines!

These wines will also pair well with tasty appetizers and finish with a fantastic chocolate fountain and fruit tasting!

Tasting: 6:00-8:00pm - Tasting starts at 6:15pm
Post Tasting: 8-11pm - Enjoy your favorite wine with fresh pizza delivered while playing silly Board Games

Cost is $20.00

Appetizers will include:
Various Cheeses & breads
Stuffed olives
Grapes
Chicken Skewers
Steak Skewers
Cheese Ravioli
Italian Salami
Chocolate fountain & fresh fruit/marshmallows

Wines - Pairing with Appetizers
2008 Chateau St Michelle Riesling - Columbia Valley - CA
2008 Gavi Di Gavi - White - Villa Rosa - Italy
2008 Kanu Chenin Blanc - Stellenbosch - South Africa

Wines - Pairing with Chocolates
2006 Monte Antico Toscana - Red Blend - Tuscan - Italy
2008 Maipe Malbec - Mendoza, Argentina
2006 Echelon - Pinot Noir - France

Miss Kitty & Kewpie will be offering 2 wines for the group to enjoy! If anyone has a wine they would like to bring and share feel free to let Patti know...
1987 Porto Kopke Colheita
2008 Stump Jump - Red - Australian


Things to bring:

Wine Glass & wine charm or a way to identify your glass throughout the night.
An extra folding chair. Keep in your car in case you need it.
Your favorite Board Game.

As usual...you can pay online at Have Fun, Will Travel meetup site, if you are a member of that group. Otherwise you can pay by check to Terri Bruno, 319 Todd Road, Wolcott, CT 06716. All checks must be received by January 11th.

FYI...Center Street Wine & Spirits offers Friday Night Wine Tastings between 4:00-8:00pm. They are located at 382 Center Street in Wallingford! Beth hopes to see you there sometime!
item.how_to_find_us: Address will be sent via email to attendees prior to event

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: International Wine Tasting and Party!
